name: Mobius Telegram Tip Bot
description: Telegram bot, allowing to tip users for cool messages in cryptocurrencies

MOBIUS_TIPBOT_TOKEN.description: Telegram bot token. You can obtain one, using BotFather

MOBIUS_TIPBOT_APP_PRIVATE_KEY.description: Seed of Stellar account for depositing tips

MOBIUS_TIPBOT_CREDIT_ADDRESS.description: Public key of the Stellar account with money pool for tips

MOBIUS_TIPBOT_ASSET_CODE.description: Custom Stellar asset code for tips

MOBIUS_TIPBOT_APP_BALANCE_ALERT_THRESHOL.description: Threshold for alerting about low app balance

MOBIUS_TIPBOT_SMTP_HOST.description: SMTP server host for sending notifications

MOBIUS_TIPBOT_SMTP_PORT.description: SMTP server port for sending notifications
